title: Bent's Old Fort National Historic Site: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â       The park is accessed via U.S. Highway 50 and Highway 194. From La Junta, Colorado on U.S. Highway 50, take Highway 109 north 1 mile to Highway 194, then east on Highway 194 six miles to the fort. From Las Animas, Colorado, on U.S. Highway 50, take Highway 194 west 13 miles. Click here for a hiking trail map of the park.
